sub_title: CEO & Co-Founder MaxProMed ★ Msc Strategic Management & Msc Change Management ★ Vice President of BKL USA
summary:
As a manager & consultant, thanks to my two masters in Change Management and Strategic Management I can make the translation between the goal and its practical implementation. So far I have done this not only by studying and teaching these subjects, but also by developing and implementing strategies for my own companies. Recently I led a COVID-19 testing organization completely from the start to a successful organization. Now with Covid on its decline I am currently open for a new challenge.

Specializing in: Strategy, Change, Supply Chain, Business Model Innovation, Motivation, Outsourcing

Core traits: Extravert, Energetic, Ambitious, Entrepreneurial, Fast thinker, Authentic, Critical, Rational, Creative problem solver, Goal oriented, Analytical, Both People and Task Oriented, ENTJ Personality.

Hobbies: Managing Teams in Online Games, Skating, Debating, Chess, Karate, Lecturing, Traveling.

Skills and Characteristics I would like to use in my (future) job: Analytical, Problem Solving, Goal-Oriented, Strategic thinking

Fields Of Interest:
Supply Chain Management, Strategy, Change Management, Business Model Innovation, Consultancy, Decision Making, Motivation, Outsourcing, International Location Strategies, Market Entry, Stakeholder & Partner Management, Strategic Alliances, Work & Organizational Psychology, Motivation, Trans-Organizational Management, Virtual Leadership, Neuro-marketing, Blockchain, Digital Transformation.

treasury_media.title: Maxpromed | Stay safe, stay negative
treasury_media.description: Na ons eerst vanuit Holland Distribution, en vervolgens vanuit MaxProMed op PPE gefocust te hebben zijn we in 09/2020 ons meer gaan focussen op corona-test-services. Hierbij begonnen we als een van de eerste die met antigeen testen bij bedrijven op locatie kwam testen, om vervolgens in 11/2020 onze eerste fysieke teststraat te openen. Hierna groeide we vlug tot een bedrijf met 8 publieke locaties en meer dan 50 man op de vloer en 10 backoffice medewerkers achter de schermen.

profile_positions.description:
After COVID-19 took its decline I was really enthusiastic about taking my energy, knowledge and skills back to the Corporate life.

BKL is specialized in customized tooling for lifting purposes. Their process involves everything from engineering till production and aftercare (service).

BKL gave me the opportunity to lead (individually) their project to establish themselves in the United States.

Parallel, Anvil Industries, which is the mother company of BKL, asked me to investigate and execute their group activities in the USA as well.

This is an ongoing project. My responsibilities include in short, investigating the Why, What, Where & How, and making it happen, and more elaborately include:
- Creating a strategic rational for establishing a local enterprise in the United States (or decide to cancel the project)
- Deciding what activities to undertake in the United States
- Investigating opportunities in the United States
- Analyzing where to go and making a decision on where to establish
- Deciding on how to start and what activities to execute locally
- Creating a strategy for the USA
- Creating a portfolio of desired competences
- Setting up a local team in the USA
- Writhing an implementation plan
- Implementing and executing the plan by establishing a company in the USA and opening office
- Investigating needs and desires of internal and external stakeholders (including current USA customers)
- Stakeholder management
- Investigating the opportunity to create a HUB function for the sister companies, and hence starting a company which would also carry out activities for their sister companies (members of Anvil Industries)
- Investigating the opportunities and process for setting up an engineering department, service organisation and/or production facility in the United States (and implementing in case this is decided upon) (future stage of the project).
profile_positions.title: Vice President BKL USA

profile_positions.description:
After first from within Holland Distribution, and after from within MaxProMed focusing on PPE (Personal Protection Equipment), we started in 09/2020 to focus omre on Covid-Test-Services. As such we were among the first (probably the very first) to test on-site at companies on COVID-19. Afterwards in 11/2020 we also opened our first testing facility, after which we grew to a big player with 8 public testing-facilities with over 50 medical employees and 10 backoffice employees. With this team we participated in several governmental tenders such as:
- Open house 1 (testing employees with complaints)
- Open house 2 (testing employees without complaints)
- Testen voor reizen
- Testen voor toegang 

Also did we have several on-site locations within companies, and were we the preferred supplierfor companies such as:
- The Militairy airports
- Faurecia; DHL
- Trespa
- Roveg Fruit
- Research institute TNO
- Verasol 

In 2 years time we reinvented our business model over 10 times, and by being both lean and agile we are amongst the oldest still active players in the market. At the moment we have around 20 mobile locations in south-east Netherlands, next to several physical locations. 

Personally I was responsible for:
•	Strategy and company vision, both long term and short term
•	Business model strategy & Market positioning
•	Business Development, Innovation & Expansion
•	Managing Daily operations and solving crisis situations
•	Managing the Backoffice
•	Purchasing and inventory management
•	Stakeholder and partner management, and managing Key Accounts (customers) 
•	Protocols and training programs (and testing if all know and follow protocols)
•	Developing, improving and controlling standard protocols and ways of working
profile_positions.title: CEO and Founder

profile_positions.description:
For many years, I have organized Business Trips and Inspiration Trips to Estonia. Now I have gathered a team of experts around me, to serve our Estonia explorers even better!
On my trips I introduce people to Estonia, its digital transformation, digital innovations, e-governance, education, startup ecosystem and the great companies and experts who made their country digital.
Estonia has a lot to offer in the field of education, entrepreneurship and digital governance, and offers many possibilities for companies to establish international collaboration or do outsourcing.
profile_positions.title: CEO & Founder

profile_positions.description:
•	Lecturer Organizational Behavior (Bachelor) (84 hours of lecturing) (12/20-06/21)
•	Lecturer Digital Transformation (Master) (20 hours of lecturing) (12/20-06/21)
•	Lecturer Change Management (Master) (8 hours of lecturing) (07/2019)
profile_positions.title: Lecturer

profile_positions.description:
DCG Lab is an international research and consultancy team which focuses on neuromarketing, neuro branding, biometric sensory marketing. By doing so DCG Lab helps companies to improve their marketing analytics. This research group tries to understand consumer behavior and decision making from a neurological perspective. DCG Lab brings multidisciplinary talents together to solve branding issues in the customer-centric era.

Since COVID19 and the required focus because of this on MaxProMed I am since then only involved as a board member and co-founder.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder and Chief Strategy Officer

profile_positions.description:
Teaching managers and directors how to strategically manage and change organizations, and how to deal with Human Resource issues. For these Management Seminars in People and Business Management I prepared a program with a total duration up to approximately 60 hours.

Main Subjects: Strategic Management, Motivation, Change Management, Neuro Marketing, Estonia, Destination branding, Outsourcing, Supply Chain Management, Organizational Behavior, Work Psychology, Human Resource Management, Personnel Management, Performance Management, Team Management, Group Dynamics, Decision Making Processes, Personality Types, MBTI, Organizational Commitment, Job Satisfaction, Organizational Design, Workplace Design, Job Design, Leadership.

Since 2020 I organize these kind of projects and seminars from within other organizations I am involved at.
profile_positions.title: CEO & Founder

profile_positions.description:
Started as a developer and producer of high-end gadgets with an international supply
chain, nowadays the we focus on international distribution as we try to be the Dutch solution partner
for the Middle East and Central Asia. After focusing on Saffron for a while we started focusing on personal protection equipment (PPE) since the 2nd wave of COVID19 in 2020. After several months this made Holland Distribution to change to MaxProMed BV, with which the focus was 100% COVID19.

Main responsibilities:
•	Managing the staff and managing general organizational and juridical aspects
•	Developing and implementing new strategies and distribution systems
•	Outsourcing production around the world
•	Managing the supplier portfolio and maintaining relationships with Dutch partners
•	Organizing Inspiration trips to Estonia
•	Matchmaking between international businesses
profile_positions.title: CEO & Founder

profile_positions.description:
This traineeship trained me to become the linking pin between business and IT. 
•	Trained on Security, Analysis, Design and Database design and IT management. 
•	Studied SQL, SCRUM, Lean and Agile.
profile_positions.title: Masterclass Professional (IT Traineeship)

profile_positions.description:
For the Minor "Acceleration Program" at the Fontys I teach 3rd and 4th year Bachelor students in the field of Neuro Marketing. The course contains 25-30 lecturing hours related to decision-making, perception and neuro marketing, and provides students with an opportunity for the students to use the tools in practice.
Subjects being thought during this course include:
- Introduction to Neuro Marketing
- How to gain attention
- How to create messages the brain likes
- How to create a good brand identity
- How to gain emotional engagement
- How to get attention
- Introduction to Story Telling
- Introduction to Decision Making
- Rational and Irrational Decision Making
- Curiosity 
- Emotions
- Perception
- Psychology of Perception and Change
- Consumer Behavior
- Motivation and Goal Setting
- Tools (EEG, GSR, Facial Coding, Eye Tracking
- Hormonal Coding
- Implicit association tests
- Business Models for Neuro Marketing
profile_positions.title: Visiting Lecturer

profile_positions.description:
Main Responsibilities:
•	Lecturing one semester a year (about 10 hour a year) on Nation Branding, Strategic Management, Marketing Strategies, Technological Innovations, TRIZ trends, Blockchain, Digital Residency, Digital Government and Outsourcing in general, and Estonian Culture and Business Opportunities in particular
•	Guiding projects on a yearly base regarding similar subjects like international business opportunities and technological innovations, which are related to students their international trip to Estonia
•	Creating, supervising and grading projects regarding Marketing Strategies, Technological Innovation, Strategic Management, Nation Branding and Business Opportunities for: startups, (innovative) companies and digital government
•	Guiding one-week trips to Estonia and developing a program on site
profile_positions.title: Visiting Lecturer

volunteer_experiences.description: This is mostly about accompanying and escorting the skaters of the Friday Night Skate in Tallinn every Friday as a staff member. We also guaranty the safety of the attendees.
